title: ate lunch in the bathroom stall bc i had nowhere to sit
content: not my proudest moment but the cafeteria was packed and my usual table was taken and i literally just... went to the bathroom and ate my sandwich in a stall. is this rock bottom??? i think this is rock bottom lol

title: pretended to be sick so i could stay home and finish my essay
content: ok but like... is this even wrong?? i had a 10 page essay due and i was nowhere near done so i fake coughed this morning and my mom was like 'oh honey stay home' and now im actually being productive for once lol. guilt level: 6/10

comments.content: this is just called working smarter not harder bestie
mental health days are real health days!! you needed the time
i do this like once a month lol no regrets
